Shoes are very comfortable. Your toes have plenty of room and do not feel crowded. If you follow he steps they law out you will get the proper size.

Unfortunately the inside seams of the shoe canvas were very rough on the skin of my feet. This made the shoes irritating and uncomfortable. Had to return them. No problems with the return.
Bought them six months ago, wore them nearly daily. They're comfortable and I really like how they look. My foot is 24 cm long and I got a size 38, they feel slightly tight with thick socks tho.

Like this shoe a lot! Great price for a wide toe box shoe. I went up half a size (usually 7.5, bought an 8) and it fits great! Would totally buy again. I got the brown color, and it ended up looking more pink than brown but I'm not mad.
Best shoes I have ever purchased on Amazon.  Great price, great quality and great fit.  My new favorite shoes.  I will buy again!

Love the width of this shoe. Very comfortable

These shoes were comfy and offer that barefoot feeling without looking like clown shoes. I took one start away because the color around the toe does fade quickly, making them look older than they actually are.

I needed a pair of white sneakers to take to Europe this past summer that weren’t super expensive but with the wide toe box and zero drop. I walked all over Europe with these and aside from getting dirty, which I expected, they are white after all, they were awesome!!! I am used to the barefoot style of shoe and I always add a 3-4 mm insole to all of my shoes. These were super comfortable and walked a lot of miles! This is a great brand if you want to try barefoot style!

Barefoot shoe girl here and let me tell you, these are SO worth the money. I removed the inserts to give myself a bit more room and less cushion. If you're on a budget and want barefoot, take the leap and try these. They have held up well for store runs, farmers markets, pot lucks, and many walks.
If you wear CT, this line is for you! If you know. You know! Enjoy the comfort, stability, and look!
Nice shoes for the price! Canvas makes them washable and I love how comfortable they are. Would recommend if you want barefoot shoes without the crazy price.
Glad to have found an affordable, wide, zero drop shoe for the whole family. They feel good quality and seem to hold up rather well
I can’t say enough how much I love these shoes! I have tried so many kinds of shoes and these are the first ones that don’t hurt my feet!
I wore these shoes everyday and loved them until I wore right through the soles after roughly 6 months.

评论概述: They last, they’re comfy, will buy again
评论详情: I’ve had these for about a year, they still look like new and lots of tread left. They’re VERY slip resistant, good rubber bottom on them. I do get that basketball court “squeak” if I stop quickly. Kind of annoying but better than slipping. This is my first pair of barefoot shoes (which idk what the name is about, I always wear socks). After about 3 days of wearing them, the pain I used to have in my feet was gone. After 2 weeks, I stopped hobbling out of bed in the morning and had no foot discomfort in the mornings. Really pleased with my purchase. They do have a clown shoe” look to them, but for the comfort, I don’t even care. Most people don’t even notice until I point it out.  The canvas is great quality. I will DEFINITELY be buying more. Just wish I could find dressier shoes for work and special occasions that fit the way these do.
These are very comfortable and have a great fit! They also last quit a long time.
top
I have been loving this brand of shoe. I did notice that this style with the canvas fabric runs a little small. So I’d recommend getting a size up from what you normally get.

I have wide feet and a narrow heel, and this shoe fits perfectly! Plenty of room in the toe box, and hardly any heel slippage (with slightly thicker socks, no heel slippage).

I think these are pretty good shoes to get started on the barefoot shoes journey. I've worn them everyday! super cute and don't look like clown shoes! They are a little too big on me. I got the smallest size and I usually wear a womens 5.5. But, having such small feet, I'm kind of used to having shoes that are a bit too big.

I bought these in October but forgot about them so I didn’t start wearing them until November after the return date. I really liked them until today 12/12/24. Unfortunately, the tongue on the shoe pulled right out as I was adjusting it today. I did want to buy these shoes in other colors but will no longer do so.

LOVE these shoes!!  So comfortable and exactly what I wanted ... Except would like to have another pair in leather ... But these are great!!!  Plenty of toe room if you have foot problems ... I bought this shoe in another color a couple of years ago and it fit fine. This time, the shoe is notably smaller. Had to return.

Love these so much I've ordered 3 pairs in black, white and grey! My feet have never been so comfortable. I usually wear a size 9 and the 9s in this brand fit perfectly, as expected. I really like that you can remove the insole and put your own in. I prefer extra cushion and arch support. My toes are much happier since purchasing these shoes. I hope they last a while, considering I will be alternating between the different pairs I purchased. They seem well made/sturdy. I think they are a great price. Very cute, casual, every day shoe. If you have wide feet and are tired of your toes being smashed, give these a try!

This is my second pair of Whitin shoes. It’s a different style and I like this one more! I’m transitioning into barefoot shoes and this was a great, affordable option. My shoe laces were very different lengths but not too much of a problem for me as I plan on switching them out anyway. I really like the fact that they are super affordable and I hope it stays the same price! I have a plethora of different brand shoes that are white, but these catch dirt so much quicker for some reason. Overall, I would buy these again!
These are lightweight, comfortable and has a roomy toe area.
These shoes are made in China so I ordered my regular size and they were way too small. Would not order again.

评论概述: Most comfortable shoes but it sounds like I'm breakdancing every time I go to the restroom.
评论详情: One of the most comfortable things to put on my feet but it sounds like I'm breakdancing every time I go to the restroom.

These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever bought. I work 10 hours and I’m on my feet most of the time, my feet do not hurt at all. They are lightweight. Only thing is if you drag your feet, the shoes do squeak so you will know if you drag your feet if you are not aware of it. But overall they are great and I plan to buy two other color pairs.

I measured as instructed and ordered according to the recommended size, but I could not get my foot into the shoe. I returned the shoes and will reorder them in size 10.5, the original pair was size 9. The shoes appear well made.

I loved the color (blush) and the feel in general.  Unfortunately, these run small.  My foot measures 25.5cm or 10.03" long.  I ordered the 10.5 in women, which is supposed to fit a 10.8" long foot.  Unfortunately, I only had maybe 2mm between my big toe and the front of the shoe.  I'm very disappointed.  Whitin offers the same shoe in men, but not the blush color.
They were actually a good width but I think I need an entire size larger than I usually wear

I got a pair of white and this pair and they're my go-to shoes! Comfortable and versatile, I wear with dresses or shorts. They do still have a bit of lift in the toes but if you're looking for some easy introduction to "barefoot shoes" these are great.
Order half size larger

We have several pairs of Whitin shoes for our family. Unfortunately, this pair was made poorly. The tongue is sewn inches shorter on the right shoe, causing the shoe to rub your skin raw. My daughter has attempted to wear them twice, once with short socks and once with long. I assumed she was being a picky teen and I wore them myself to go shopping last week. They were so uncomfortable I had to continuously adjust the tongue. If I had a sewing machine that could sew through the thick canvas, I would simply repair them myself. Since we are just past the return window, I am out $40!

I always have a hard time walking because shoes are so tight around my toes. I don’t have that problem with these. I took a picture of my normal shoes and you can see how the toe shape is different. These give my toes room to spread when I walk. You can take the inserts out or add your own. I added my arch support inserts on top of the inserts in the shoes. I can wear women’s 9 or 8.5 wide, in these shoes I bought a 9 and they fit perfectly.
I bought 2 different sizes and both my toes feel cramped at the ends
I typically wear a size 6. This brand feels snug, but it's not a deal breaker. I wear them all the time and they are great.
I love this shoes im going to get the other colors ! Super lightweight , slip resistance and fit !

Love these sneakers. I have bought 2 more pairs of them. I definitely needed to size up because my regular size was too small but once I got a size larger they are perfect. I wear them every where. I love the rounded toe and comfy these are.
Returned because the heel pinched and was too stiff

I’m a 7.5, 38 and they didn’t have that in the color I wanted, so got an 8. (39) it fits fine with socks but next time might try the size down. These are so wide even for people with high volume, wide feet! I even tried adding a cozy shearling insole for a cold day, and there was plenty of room. They’re really cute and the perfect minimalist retro canvas sneaker. In the picture I cut off the Whitin tag with tiny sewing scissors lol.

I've ordered shoes with wide toe boxes before, but they always end up looking like water shoes because the fabric across the toes is so baggy and ugly. These shoes are cute, the toes aren't baggy, and they seriously saved my toes. I have Lupus and I work as a pharmacy technician. During COVID I had to wrap my pinky toes in gauze and medical tape every day before work or else I'd have black and/or bloodied pinky toes all the time. I just had no clue about wide shoes, haha. Anyway, these are very comfortable and I love them. One of the comfiest pairs of shoes I've ever owned.
This is the most comfortable shoe I've ever bought! I have very wide feet. I spent yesterday on my feet walking and didn't feel like I had shoes on.
Fits very comfortably, wide foot. Plenty of toe room. Higher on the ankle than a regular tennis shoe but still is comfortable.

I love these barefoot shoes! I usually buy a more expensive brand but wanted a pair with style too so I’m so happy i found these! They are so comfy and are made with good quality. They are lightweight and I will wear them as my stylish/casual pair of shoes with jeans or dresses in spring, summer and fall. Great for a minimalist like me. I got my regular size 8 and they fit well.
LOVE these!!!! Wide toe box & they don’t look goofy like most barefoot shoes do! Wide toe box is way better for your foot to function properly!
The wide toe box is very comfortable and for a wide toe box shoe it’s fairly cute. I rated 4 stars because I think that it could be a little more sleek looking but it’s good for the price

The shoes appear to be well made but the sizing is off from normal sizing. I am returning my size 8 for a 9 to see if those fit better. My toes were touching the ends of the shoe with my normal size. Can't say anything about the quality of the shoes since I still haven't worn them, but I'd say they're close to quality of what you'd find at Payless back in the day. I would buy again if I can get the sizing correct.

Roomy, comfortable, stylish, I love those and I’m pretty picky about my shoes. I like the wise toes as I really disliked my toes being squished. They give decent support even though the sole is thinner. Great alternative when I can’t walk barefoot.

Comfortable for a while but the insole completely detached within a few wears. I’ve tried to fix it on multiple occasions with no luck. Shoes shouldn’t fall apart within a couple weeks. I have other pairs from the same brand that it hasn’t happened to so maybe it’s just this style.

评论概述: Works for little boys as well!
评论详情: My son's foot was 18in long and he did not want the kids velcro options. He's 10 years old and we bought these women's black on black in size 5.5. Not too feminine in any way, he has no clue. They fit great! Give a skater vibe for sure.
Very cute. I love them. Feels very comfortable on my feet. Light. Size is perfect- true to size.

评论概述: Only non-tennis shoe that works after my toe replacement
评论详情: Im so excited to find this shoe I had my big toe replaced, and the only shoe i’ve been able to wear since are mesh tennis shoes  This shoe actually has a wide toe box (as opposed to 90% of the shoes that claim they do) The insole it comes with is basically a peice of paper, but the shoes are deep enough that my orthotics comfortably fit inside without making my foot come out the back. The toe box is also wide enough that i don’t get pinched after putting the orthotic in. They don’t provide as much support as a good tennis shoe, but they are cute and don’t hurt and with my orthotic in it i can do a normal amount of walking (like grocery store, but not a museum)
No foot pain, feels so good to wear all the time

I bought the expensive brands before I found these and these are better! I will say, everyday wear maybe doesn’t get you that long with some of the styles. I wore the mesh version (with gum sole) of this shoe out in maybe 8 months but also washed them in the washer and wore them every day. These canvas ones with white sole seem much sturdier and I have them in a few colors. LOVE LOVE LOVE!
They are comfortable and really cute!

I absolutely love these shoes. I was super excited about the large toe box and I think they are attractive. They are incredibly well made and sturdy! I love how they're made, I love how they're laced instead of bungee strapped and I love how they have a real sole. Once I found my right size (which took a a couple of times), they were ultimately just too flat on the heel comfort for me. Probably my age. (Over 50) I'm very sad I can't use them but I would recommend them to anybody who doesn't have a problem with the flatness. I gave them five stars, not because I kept them but because I think they are a good buy and very well made.

I realized my shoes i was bring to a festival in Texas were going to cause me foot issues with the coming miles i would be walking days. I quickly realized Amazon would be my only good option for a wide toe berefoot shoe that i could rely on for a quick delivery. Long story short i wore them everyday for 2 day with zero discomfort.
The tongue fell off the left shoe the very first time I wore them. It was not sewn on properly, at all. I'm so disappointed

评论概述: Comfy, cute, breathable, want more of them
评论详情: My first barefoot shoes. I love them. I would wear them for all occasions if I could. Get them on sale: be patient.

Love these as an introduction to barefoot shoes. Really worth the price to try out barefoot shoes without the price tag. There is no arch support (which is the point). They have very little cushioning but enough to make it so you don’t feel every rock. Love the wide toe box and they actually look a lot better in person than I thought they would!
These shoes are affordable and surprisingly durable for such a reasonable priced items. There shape is perfect and they look better than most barefoot style shoes.

I ordered size 9s, I normally wear size 9s. The toe box was fine and comfortable. The material was breathable. But after a few hours, maybe 3, my feet started to ache like crazy. By the end of my shift at work I could barely stand. Zero support and no room for insoles to try and alleviate it. If you're not on your feet much these work okay, but if you're moving a lot of intend to with them I would NOT recommend these in the slightest

Fits my minimum aesthetic. I love that they are flat and simple, but I don’t think they’re worth $40, material and shoes simplicity gives $20. I brought my exact size (8) but I would purchase a half size up if I were to exchange, they’re a bit tight on my big toe. Thinking overtime the canvas material could relax, making it the perfect size. I haven’t walked in them long distance to give an honest review but this is my experience upon delivery.

I got these to use as work shoes, I am on my feet for 12 hour shifts multiple days a week. I absolutely love these shoes. They are the third pair I’ve gotten from this brand and I will keep buying them. I have used them for both work and daily shoes and enjoy them for both. They have really nice grippy soles, I really appreciate the thickness of the fabric as well and the price is great! I expect to use them for at least a year and if they do as well as my previous pair probably quite a bit longer.
Very comfy. Love the wide toe box. Keeps my toes happy!

I have had foot pain for the better part of the last 10 years and spent hundreds of dollars on shoes. These shoes, omg I finally have happy feet and absolutely love not having pain no more when I walk. And no I am not a robot either!!
While these shoes are comfortable, the slightest bit of moisture under the sole makes it dangerous on smooth surfaces. There is no grip or slip resistance in these shoes.
The tongue ripped out after only a few days of wearing them… they are comfy but not happy about that. That should not be happening
Bought these for my daughter and they are so adorable, I got some in my size!
Order a size up! These are great!
I love these shoes!  I recently developed plantar fasciitis in my right foot and the roomy-ness of these shoes make all the difference

I stem a lot with my toes which causes me to take off my shoes as I cannot move my toes enough in regular shoes. These shoes are wide enough in the toes that I can stem and not have to take them off constantly, even at work.  I also have the Foot Feet Arch support system. Arches work well, the insole do not. I am having to put the toe wedge in the insole of the shoe as it's a much wider toe box. Highly recommend for the autistic person that does the toe stemming.
Great value. I am always looking for barefoot shoes that fit my budget and these get me around NYC!

I teach and can be on my feet for 8+ hours a day. I have VERY wide feet and most shoes hurt the sides of my feet after only a few hours, but these don’t hurt at all. These are the most comfortable shoes I own. I will be purchasing all the colors
Love the look of these shoes and comfortable. Just wish the Whitens (I have 3 pair) didn't squeak so much when the rubber meets the road!
I usually wear 8.5, sometimes a 9, so I purchased a 9… too short, my toes rub against the toe of the shoe.  I will try th 9.5 to see if they fit better.
I have the cream and black pair and plan on getting the boots. Plenty of toe room. Great for beginning shoes
The shoes are wide enough for feet and good for people who surfer the bursion

I loved these shoes. I had been looking for a white shoe with a minimalistic look to them and was happy to have found these. They went well with mostly every outfit.  Unfortunately, after wearing them for about a month, I developed sciatic nerve pain. My legs feel numb even two weeks after I stopped wearing them due to the nerve damage. My knees hurt the most but the pain goes all the way down to my feet. I’m in my early 30s, I walk and run a lot in general so my legs are pretty strong but now this injury has kept me from walking as much. I feel like I can’t stand for long now.
I enjoy these shoes very much! I notice quick wear and tear on the laces, but the shoes are great.
I love these shoes, I am a size 9 and ordered that size but after wearing them, my toes touched and rubbed against the front of the shoe so I returned them

This is my second pair of zero drop shoes. They are generally comfortable and have the look of a nice loafer. On the down side, I went with the recommendation to downsize and am now hoping to get the shoes to stretch. My actual size of 81/2 would have been a better fit and kept my big toe from pressing the front of the shoe, but is unavailable. I’m not super knowledgeable, but I recently purchased a pair of Hobibears, which definitely seemed like more of a barefoot shoe and I would classify these as more of a transitional shoe with some of the extra padding most contemporary shoes provide. Overall I like the shoes and plan to wear them regularly if I can stretch them just a smidge.
They are so comfortable!! My husband and I each have some and we love them

I love this brand, I have purchased multiple shoes and they are amazing. After you used wide toe box shoes you are not able to go back to an uncomfortable shoe again. I have recommended them to many of my friends and they love it too. Also, I love how light weighted they are.

First, I was worried they would run small due to some of the comments. But they ended up fitting true to size for me. They Definitely check all the barefoot boxes and they are so comfortable so far. Also, happy to find they don’t look clown like at all lol!  Get them!! So worth it.

评论概述: Very good beginner shoe to barefoot wear
评论详情: Very comfortable upon arrival, and are generally versatile for every day use. Very little arch support to help your feet adjust to barefoot shoes. True to size. These are NOT slip resistant, not recommended for hiking, especially on rocks or anything you need a grip on, you will slide. They pick up a lot of sand adding to the non slip resistance. They are also very lightweight and flexible, I do really like these shoes but will be upgrading to a more durable pair of barefoot shoes soon.

These were my very first pair of minimalist shoes or barefoot shoes. I love the wide toe box and the fact that you can wear them with or without socks and they're just as comfortable. They are a great price over the name brands, and in my opinion just as great! For anyone planning to purchase these shoes I definitely recommend wearing them for a couple of hours each day walking around outside to get used to them. Will definitely be buying another pair!
